product_name: National Geographic The Ultimate Hiker's Gear Guide
long_description: Featuring complete, up-to-date information. Author: Andrew Skruka. Softcover; 224 pages; color photographs and illustrations. National Geographic; copyright 2011. Covers how to choose the best terrain, select appropriate gear, properly pack your equipment and walk with a heavy pack. Includes handy recommendations on clothing, footwear, sleeping bags, shelters, maps, trekking poles, food, cooking, water small items and packing it all up. Offers sample gear lists for eastern forests, western mountains, packrafting in the southwest desert and the northern winter. National Geographic.
short_description: Featuring complete, up-to-date information The Ultimate Hiker's Gear Guide from National Geographic takes you through every aspect of hiking equipment with a hefty dose of proven techniques.
